Sequence Information.Peptide Name: Ac-AMP1 (A. caudatus antimicrobial peptide 1, natural AMPs; UCSS1a; 3S=S, chitin-binding, plants; BBS)

Literature Information.Literature: Active against fungi A. brassicola (IC50 7 ug/ml), A. pisi (IC50 8 ug/ml), B. cinera (IC50 10 ug/ml), C. lindemuthianum (IC50 8 ug/ml), F. culmorum (IC50 2 ug/ml), T. hamatum (IC50 7 ug/ml), and V. dahliae (IC50 6 ug/ml). but inactive against Gram+ B.megaterium (IC50 250 ug/ml). Updated 7/2021

Literature Information.Title: Antimicrobial peptides from Amaranthus caudatus seeds with sequence homology to the cysteine/glycine-rich domain of chitin-binding proteins
